effects.name: Land Rush
effects.text: On each board with [Town]/[City], add 1 [Town] to a land without [Town].

effects.name: Fast Start
effects.text: During Setup, on each board add 1 [Town] to land #3.

effects.name: Surge of Colonists
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, Move the bottom-most Stage III Card just below the bottom-most Stage I Card.

effects.name: Efficient
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, remove 1 additional Stage I Card.

effects.name: Aggressive Timetable
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, remove 1 additional Stage II Card.

effects.name: Ruthelessly Efficient
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, remove 1 additional Stage I Card.

effects.name: Terrifyingly Efficient
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, remove all Stage I Cards.

effects.name: Proud & Mighty Capital
effects.text: If 7 or more [Town]/[City] are ever in a single land, the Invaders win.

effects.name: Building Boom
effects.text: On each board with [Town]/[City], Build in the land with the most [Town]/[City].

effects.name: Indentured Servants Earn Land
effects.text: Build Actions affect lands without Invaders, if they are adjacent to at least 2 [Town]/[City] before the Build Action.

effects.name: Criminals and Malcontents
effects.text: During Setup, on each board add 1 [City] to land #1, and 1 [Town] to land #2.

effects.name: High Immigration (I)
effects.text: Put the "High Immigration" tile on the Invader Board, to the left of "Ravage". The invaders take this Build Action each Invader Phase before Ravaging. Cards slide left from Ravage to it, and from it to the discard pile. Remove the tile when a Stage II card slides onto it, putting that card in the discard.

effects.name: High Immigration (I)
effects.text: Perform a Build Action for each card on the "High Immigration" tile.

effects.name: High Immigration (I)
effects.text: Invader Cards slide left from Ravage to "High Immigration", and from there to the discard pile. Remove the tile when a Stage II card slides onto it, putting that card in the discard.

effects.name: High Immigration (full)
effects.text: Put the "High Immigration" tile on the Invader Board, to the left of "Ravage". The invaders take this Build Action each Invader Phase before Ravaging. Cards slide left from Ravage to it, and from it to the discard pile. The extra Build tile remains out the entire game.

effects.name: High Immigration (full)
effects.text: Perform a Build Action for each card on the "High Immigration" tile.

effects.name: High Immigration (full)
effects.text: Invader Cards slide left from Ravage to "High Immigration", and from there to the discard pile. The extra build tile remains out the entire game.

effects.name: Local Autonomy
effects.text: [Town]/[City] have +1 Health.

effects.name: Independent Resolve
effects.text: Add 1 additional [Fear] to the Fear Pool per player in the game.

effects.name: Independent Resolve
effects.text: During any Invader Phase where you resolve no Fear Cards, perform the Build from High Immigration twice.

effects.name: Swayed by the Invaders
effects.text: After Invaders Explore into each land this Phase, if that land has at least as many Invaders as [Dahan], replace 1 [Dahan] with 1 [Town].

effects.name: Heavy Mining
effects.text: If the Invaders do at least 6 Damage to the land during Ravage, add an extra [Blight].
effects.xtext: (This does not cause extra cascades / [Presence] destruction.)

effects.name: Population Pressure at Home
effects.text: During Setup, on each board add 1 [City] to land #4. On boards where land #4 starts with [Blight], put that [Blight] in land #5 instead.

effects.name: Fine Steel for Tools and Guns
effects.text: [Town] deal 3 Damage. [City] deal 5 Damage.

effects.name: Setup
effects.text: At the end of Setup (after resolving the initial Explore Card), Accelerate the Invader Deck. On each board, add 1 [Town] to the land of the discarded terrain with the fewest Invaders.
effects.xtext: (Accelerate: Discard the topmost card of the lowest Invader Stage remaining in the deck.)

effects.name: Mining Rush
effects.text: When Ravaging adds at least 1 [Blight] to a land, also add 1 [Town] to an adjacent land without [Town]/[City]. Cascading [Blight] does not cause this effect.

effects.name: Prospecting Outpost
effects.text: During Setup, on each board add 1 [Town] and 1 [Blight] to land #8. The [Blight] comes from the box, not the Blight Card.

effects.name: Sprawling Plantations
effects.text: Before Setup, return all but 7 [Town] per player to the box. Invaders win if you ever cannot place a [Town].

effects.name: Sprawling Plantations
effects.text: Invaders win if you ever cannot place a [Town].

effects.name: Demand for New Cash Crops
effects.text: After Exploring, on each board, pick a land of the shown terrain. If it has [Town]/[City], add 1 [Blight]. Otherwise, add 1 [Town].

effects.name: Multiple Adversaries: France
effects.text: If playing vs. France Level 2 or higher, increase the pool of available [Town] by 1 per player for each level of the other Adversary being played.

effects.name: Frontier Explorers
effects.text: Except during Setup: After Invaders successfully Explore into a land which had no [Town]/[City], add 1 [Explorer] there.

effects.name: Slave Labour
effects.text: During Setup, put the "Slave Rebellion" Event under the top 3 cards of the Event Deck.

effects.name: Slave Labour
effects.text: After Invaders Build in a land with 2 [Explorer] or more, replace all but 1 [Explorer] there with an equal number of [Town].

effects.name: Early Plantations
effects.text: During Setup, on each board add 1 [Town] to the highest-numbered land without [Town]. Add 1 [Town] to land #1.

effects.name: Triangle Trade
effects.text: Whenever Invaders Build a Coastal [City], add 1 [Town] to the adjacent land with the fewest [Town].

effects.name: Slow-Healing Ecosystem
effects.text: [Blight] that would go to the Blight Card from the island is put here instead. As soon as you have 3 [Blight] per player here, put it all on the Blight Card.

effects.name: Persistent Explorers
effects.text: Setup and During the Explore Step: After resolving an Explore card, on each board: Add 1 [Explorer] in a land with no [Explorer].

effects.name: Persistent Explorers
effects.text: During Play: Fear Cards don't remove [Explorer] – when one would, you may instead push that [Explorer].

effects.name: Irreparable Damage
effects.text: Track how many [Blight] come off the Blight Card during Ravage Actions that do 8+ Damage to the land. If that number ever exceeds players, the Invaders win.

effects.name: Seek Prime Territory
effects.text: After the Explore Step: On each board with 4 or fewer [Blight], add 1 [Town] to a land without [Town]/[Blight]. On each board with 2 or fewer [Blight], do so again.

effects.name: Migratory Herders
effects.text: After the normal Build Step: In each land matching a Build Card, Gather 1 [Town] from a land not matching a build card. (In board/land order.)

effects.name: More Rural Than Urban
effects.text: During Setup, on each board, add 1 [Town] to land #2 and 1 [Town] to the highest-numbered land without Setup symbols.

effects.name: More Rural Than Urban
effects.text: During Play, when Invaders would Build 1 [City] in an Inland land, they instead build 2 [Town].

effects.name: Fast Spread
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, Remove 1 additional Stage I Card.

effects.name: Herds Thrive in Verdant Lands
effects.text: [Town] in lands without [Blight] are Durable: they have +2 Health, and "Destroy [Town]" effects instead deal 2 Damage per [Town] they could Destroy. (To those [Town] only. "Destroy all [Town]" works normally.)

effects.name: Wave of Immigration
effects.text: Before the initial Explore, put the Habsburg Reminder Card under the top 5 Invader Cards.

effects.name: Wave of Immigration
effects.text: When the Habsburg Reminder Card is revealed, on each board, add 1 [City] to a Coastal land without [City] and 1 [Town] to the 3 Inland lands with the fewest [Blight].

effects.name: Far-Flung Herds
effects.text: Ravages do +2 Damage (total) if any adjacent lands have [Town].
effects.xtext: (This does not cause lands without Invaders to Ravage.)

effects.name: Hunters Swarm the Island
effects.text: Put [Beasts] Destroyed by Adversary rules on the [Russia] panel. If there are ever more [Beasts] on this panel than on the island, the Invaders win.

effects.name: Stalk the Predators
effects.text: On each board: Add 2 [Explorer] (total) among lands with [Beasts]. If you can't, instead add 2 [Explorer] among lands with [Beasts] on a different board.

effects.name: Hunters Seek Shell and Hide
effects.text: During Setup, on each board, add 1 [Beasts] and 1 [Explorer] to the highest-numbered land without [Town]/[City].

effects.name: Hunters Seek Shell and Hide
effects.text: During Play, [Explorer] do +1 Damage.

effects.name: Hunters Seek Shell and Hide
effects.text: When Ravage adds [Blight] to a land (including cascades), Destroy 1 [Beasts] in that land.

effects.name: A Sense for Impending Disaster
effects.text: The first time each Action would Destroy [Explorer]: If possible, 1 of those [Explorer] is instead Pushed; 1 [Fear] when you do so.

effects.name: Competition Among Hunters
effects.text: Ravage Cards also match lands with 3 or more [Explorer].
effects.xtext: (If the land already matched the Ravage Card, it still Ravages just once.)

effects.name: Accelerated Exploitation
effects.text: When making the Invader Deck, put 1 Stage III Card after each Stage II Card.

effects.name: Entrench in the Face of Fear
effects.text: Put an unused Stage II Invader Card under the top 3 Fear Cards, and an unused Stage III Card under the top 7 Fear Cards. When one is revealed, immediately place it in the Build space (face-up).

effects.name: Pressure for Fast Profit
effects.text: After the Ravage Step of turn 2+, on each board where it added no [Blight]: In the land with the most [Explorer] (min. 1), add 1 [Explorer] and 1 [Town].

effects.name: Trade Hub
effects.text: If the number of Coastal lands with [City] is ever greater than (2 × # of boards), the Invaders win.

effects.name: Ports Sprawl Outward
effects.text: (Before Exploring) On the single board with the most Coastal [Town]/[City], add 1 [Town] to the N lands with the fewest [Town]. (N = # of players.)

effects.name: Multiple Adversaries: Scotland
effects.text: If the other Adversary's Setup instructions would add [City] to a Coastal land other than land #2, instead add the [City] to an adjacent Inland land.

effects.name: Trading Port
effects.text: During Play, in Coastal lands, Explore Cards add 1 [Town] instead of 1 [Explorer]. "Coastal Lands" Invader Cards do this for a maximum of 2 lands per board.

effects.name: Seize Opportunity
effects.text: During Setup, add 1 [City] to land #2.

effects.name: Seize Opportunity
effects.text: Place "Coastal Lands" as the 3rd Stage II Card, and move the two Stage II Cards above it up by one.

effects.name: Chart the Coastline
effects.text: In Coastal lands, Build Cards affect lands without Invaders, as long as there is an adjacent [City].

effects.name: Ambition of a Minor Nation
effects.text: During Setup, replace the bottom Stage I Card with the bottom Stage III Card.

effects.name: Runoff and Bilgewater
effects.text: After a Ravage Action add [Blight] to a Coastal land, add 1 [Blight] to that board's Ocean (without cascading). Treat the Ocean as a Coastal Wetland for this rule and for [Blight] removal/movement.

effects.name: Exports Fuel Inward Growth
effects.text: After the Ravage Step, add 1 [Town] to each Inland land that matches a Ravage Card and is within [Range:1] of [Town]/[City].

effects.name: Land Stripped Bare
effects.text: At the end of the [Fast] Phase, the Invaders win if any land has at least 8 total Invaders/[Blight] (combined).

effects.name: Mining Tunnels
effects.text: After Advancing Invader Cards: On each board, Explore in 2 lands whose terrains don't match a Ravage or Build Card (no source required).

effects.name: Avarice Rewarded
effects.text: When [Blight] added by a Ravage Action would cascade, instead Upgrade 1 [Explorer]/[Town] (before [Dahan] counterattack).

effects.name: Ceaseless Mining
effects.text: Lands with 3 or more invaders are Mining lands.

effects.name: Ceaseless Mining
effects.text: In Mining lands, [Disease] and modifiers to [Disease] affect Ravage Actions as though they were Build Actions.

effects.name: Ceaseless Mining
effects.text: In Mining lands, during the Build Step, Build Cards cause Ravage Actions instead of Build Actions.

effects.name: Miners Come From Far and Wide
effects.text: Setup: Add 1 [Explorer] in each land with no [Dahan]. Add 1 [Disease] and 1 [City] in the highest-numbered land with a [Town] Setup symbol.

effects.name: Mining Boom (I)
effects.text: After the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with [Explorer]. Upgrade 1 [Explorer] there.

effects.name: Untapped Salt Deposits
effects.text: Setup: Remove the Stage II 'Coastal Lands' card before randomly choosing Stage II Cards. Place the 'Salt Deposits' card in place of the 2nd Stage II card.

effects.name: Mining Boom (II)
effects.text: Instead of Mining Boom (I), after the Build Step, on each board: Choose a land with [Explorer]. Build there, then Upgrade 1 [Explorer].

effects.name: The Empire Ascendant
effects.text: Setup and During the Explore Step: On boards with 3 or fewer [Blight]: Add +1 [Explorer] in each land successfully explored. (Max 2 lands per board per Explore Card.)
